translations: n.（对讲法语的女性的称呼，尤用于已婚女士）夫人，太太

sentences.sentence: Madame Clicquot is credited with the perfection of this technique.
sentences.translation: 这项工艺的完善要归功于克利科夫人。

sentences.sentence: From behind her, as if he could read her thoughts, Benny said, "You're free to go any time you like, Madame."
sentences.translation: 从她身后，好像他可以看透她的想法，本尼说道，“你什么时候想走都可以，夫人。”

sentences.sentence: Madame Curie will always be remembered as the discoverer of the element radium.
sentences.translation: 居里夫人这位镭元素的发现者，将永远为人们所怀念。
